document.full_text: u.s. private equity firm blackstone group  won approval from shanghai authorities allowing it to invest money raised abroad in china without seeking permission from the country's foreign exchange regulator, bloomberg said, citing two people with knowledge of the matter.
document.title: blackstone wins shanghai approval for yuan investment: report
lines_and_colors: u.s. private equity firm blackstone group  won approval from shanghai authorities allowing it to invest money raised abroad in china without seeking permission from the country's foreign exchange regulator, bloomberg said, citing two people with knowledge of the matter.
